ThingDef.label: buttermilk
ThingDef.description:
A tangy, slightly thickened dairy product made by combining milk with lemon juice, commonly used in baking and cooking to add moisture and a subtle acidity to recipes.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 4 buttermilk requires milk and lemons for a total value of 31, and sells for 17, giving a <color=#33CC33>54.41%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 3000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.02</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.1 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>170</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.19</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).
